translations: n．安慰，慰藉：在痛苦、失望或忧虑时给予的心理安慰。
v．安慰，慰藉：使痛苦、失望或忧虑的人感到安慰。

phrs.translation: 用某物(或某事)安慰自己

sentences.sentence: A lover can never have enough of the solaces of his beloved.
sentences.translation: 来自所爱之人的安慰再多，情人也不嫌。

sentences.sentence: I approve of ruin because what solaces you is nothing but a lie.
sentences.translation: 我赞成摧毁因为安慰你的只是谎言。
